attributes.action: MP's Should only vote for a Pro Leave MP to be the next Prime Minister.
attributes.background: Britain has voted to Leave the EU. It would not be right and proper for a Pro EU MP to be voted in as Prime Minister. The British citizens have to be sure that person has the countries needs as their priority

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament, and who MPs vote for in any party leadership context is a matter for them individually.
